DOC.brief_summary: To process blown nasal secretions from subjects with rhinosinusitis and to obtain a specimen by nasal lavage. To investigate the reliability and validity of the measurements we will determine their repeatability and compare them with those of nasal lavage in the same subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Blown Nasal Secretion Measurements in Rhinosinusitis: Repeatability and Validity Compared to Nasal Lavage
DOC.criteria: patients suffering from rhinitis with our without sinusitis unable to provide blown nasal sample
